resources.string:
Legal 
‘e_dragon_minion’, ‘e_dragon_minion2’, ‘e_dragon_minion3’, ‘eb_drgon_boss’ by Stephen “Redshrike” Challener available at: https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-enemies-11-dragons under Creative Commons CC BY 3.0. 
Credit to: Stephen "Redshrike" Challener, MrBeast, Surt, Blarumyrran, Sharm, Zabin 
 ‘eb_demon_boss’, ‘eb_mage_boss’, ‘eb_medua_boss’, ‘eb_troll_boss’ by Redshrike available at: https://opengameart.org/content/6-more-rpg-enemies under Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 
Credit to: Stephen Challener (Redshrike, Blarumyrran and LordNeo, hosted by OpenGameArt.org 
 ‘e_eye’, ’e_skeleton’, ‘e_spider’, ‘e_troll’ by Redshrike available at: https://opengameart.org/content/10-basic-rpg-enemies under Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 
Credit to: Stephen "Redshrike" Challener, hosted by OpenGameArt.org 
 ‘e_rat_minion’, ‘e_rat_minion2’, ‘eb_rat_boss’ by MrBeast and Redshrike available at: https://opengameart.org/content/rat-men-rpg-enemies under Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 
Credit to: MrBeast and Redshrike
